news.title: Jeremy Bowen: Israel's allies see evidence of war crimes in Gaza mounting up
news.summary: The Middle East has been transformed since 7 October, and almost two years on, the conflict in Gaza is at another inflection point.

news.title: Ex-Unite boss McCluskey took private jet flights arranged by building firm, report finds
news.summary: The ex-Unite chief enjoyed flights arranged by the firm building a controversial hotel, report seen by BBC says.

news.title: Cleverly returns to Tory front bench as Badenoch reshuffles team
news.summary: The former foreign secretary becomes shadow housing secretary and will face Angela Rayner in Parliament.

news.title: Mike Lynch estate and business partner owe HP Enterprise £700m, court rules
news.summary: Judge rules that the estate of the late tech tycoon, who died when his boat sank last year, must pay out.

news.title: US House speaker shuts down chamber to block Epstein vote
news.summary: The decision to bring forward the summer recess means Republican leaders can delay a politically fraught vote on the disclosures.

news.title: Brewdog to close 10 pubs across UK,  some 'within days'
news.summary: Brewdog said the "difficult decision" had been taken as a result of "ongoing industry challenges".

news.title: Man who murdered wife as she pushed their baby in pram jailed for life
news.summary: Kulsuma Akter had been living in a refuge in Bradford when she was fatally stabbed by Habibur Masum.

news.title: Food bills on course to rise by £275 a year as prices jump
news.summary: Households are trading down or making simpler meals to save money on groceries, research shows.

news.title: Five-day doctor strike will go ahead, says BMA
news.summary: Union rejects plea by health secretary to call off strikes in England and continue talks.

news.title: Edinburgh's funniest joke award scrapped for 2025
news.summary: UKTV, which presents the award, said it wanted to "reflect on how we continue to support comedy".
